channel.title: Books Job Blogs War Video Rock Crobar Fashion Aim Business Corporate Games Matiss India Politic Porn Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: my eyes are dripping tiredness
item.description: however, I don’t feel very tired. I really don’t understand how it is that I am able to lead this weird dual life. my friend adam equated it to the original mods from the 50s and 60s. he said they used to have normal jobs(working 9-5) and look like business people - then after work they would transform into these fashion seeking scene people. right after my friend adam told me this he started shouting “prolatariet.
